text: Joseph Emanuel Roth (born June 13, 1948) is an American movie executive, producer and director. He co-founded Morgan Creek Productions in 1988. He was was chairman of 20th Century Fox (1989–1993), Caravan Pictures (1993–1994), and Walt Disney Studios (1994–2000). In 2000, he founded Revolution Studios. He founded Roth Films, now Roth/Kirschenbaum Films, in 2007.
